text: @GavinNewsom I won't play Gates game. I'm not wearing a mask. Covid19 is just a flu. Last year the dead people of flu cases triblet. Why didn't the economy closed? Because PRESIDENT TRUMP wasn't against China. Think and wake up. This is another abnormal plan by Dems,Soros,Gates, Fauci & Obama
